Package org.securecryptoconfig

Class PlaintextContainer

java.lang.Object
org.securecryptoconfig.PlaintextContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaintextContainerInterface
public class PlaintextContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlaintextContainerInterface
Class representing the plaintext processed in cryptographic use cases. A PlaintextContainer contains the plaintext as byte[] representation. The class provides various cryptography operations that can be performed on the plaintext (e.g. encryption, signing).
Author:
Lisa

    • validateHash

      public boolean validateHash​(AbstractSCCHash hash) throws SCCException
      Description copied from interface: PlaintextContainerInterface
      Validate a given SCCHash against a PlaintextContainer value. ThePlaintextContainer value will be hashed again and compared if resulting hash is identical to the given one.
      Specified by:

    • encryptSymmetric

      public SCCCiphertext encryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key) throws SCCException
      Description copied from interface: PlaintextContainerInterface
      Symmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for PlaintextContainer value. A new SCCKey can be created with SCCKey.createKey(org.securecryptoconfig.SCCKey.KeyUseCase) with SCCKey.KeyUseCase.SymmetricEncryption. Alternatively it is also possible to derive a key from a password with SCCKey.createSymmetricKeyWithPassword(byte[])
      Specified by:
      encryptSymmetric in interface PlaintextContainerInterface
      Parameters:
      key - : SCCKey
      Returns:
      SCCCiphertext
      Throws:
      SCCException
